definition: to nibble away at sth/to eat into/to erode
"to eat" or "food" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 184)
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
lit. to try to steal a chicken only to end up losing the rice used to lure it (idiom)/fig. to try to gain an advantage only to end up worse off/to go for wool and come back shorn
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3

definition: see 偷雞不成蝕把米|偷鸡不成蚀把米[tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3]
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 zhao2 shi2 ba3 mi3

sentences.english: The origin type of ore deposit is a subvolcanic hydrothermal gold - bearing , altered rock type.
sentences.chinese: 矿床成因类型为次火山热液含金蚀变岩型。

sentences.english: The Longyan kaolin deposit in Fujian province, is of weathering residual type of altered granite.
sentences.chinese: 福建龙岩高岭土矿床是蚀变花岗岩风化残余型矿床。

sentences.english: Study on mapping design method of non-circular gear;
sentences.chinese: 阐述了用化学蚀剂法加工非圆齿轮的方法。

sentences.english: The Lizigou gold deposit in Song Country, western Henan Province, China, belongs to the altered tectonic type ore golden deposit.
sentences.chinese: 豫西嵩县栗子沟金矿属于构造蚀变岩型金矿床。

sentences.english: Good surface appearance after EDM process which the etching process can be replaced.
sentences.chinese: 经处理后的表面非常良好，可取代蚀花加工。

sentences.english: The mineralization type of Shaungqishan gold deposit has been divided into quartz vein and alteration type.
sentences.chinese: 将双旗山金矿矿化类型划分为石英脉型和蚀变岩型。
耐渣锓蚀，强度高，抗剥落。

sentences.english: The processing mechanism of electric melt explosion and eclipse divided by metals are analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对电熔爆加工原理及加工蚀除金属的机理进行了分析。

sentences.english: Won the eclipse heart Fu bone pill anew how?
sentences.chinese: 中了蚀心腐骨丸又如何？

sentences.english: Just remember that the plaque between your teeth can cause bad breath as well.
sentences.chinese: 一定要记住牙之间的蚀斑也能引起口臭。
凯西，我喜欢这些蚀刻画。

sentences.english: It's hand-made and the inlaid designs are etched in.
sentences.chinese: 完全手工制造，而且雕刻设计采用蚀镂法刻入。

sentences.english: But the sugar feeds plaque bacteria that cause tooth decay.
sentences.chinese: 但是糖能被蚀斑的细菌分解使牙齿腐烂。

sentences.english: The alteration of rocks is intensive. And …
sentences.chinese: 岩石蚀变强烈，硅化与金矿化关系密切。

sentences.english: The titers of measles virus were determined by standard plaque assays.
sentences.chinese: 标准蚀斑试验测定麻疹病毒滴度。

definition: soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
to bend/to violate/to go against/ruthless and tyrannical
to fall/meteor/to perish/see also 殞|殒[yun3]
